context: Hello there. Looking for a good movie?
I'm not picky I'm fine thank you
Well, I just saw Wind River (2017) and it’s a good mystery/ drama
I also enjoyed Avengers: Infinity War (2018) and Solo: A Star Wars Story (2018) Straight forward action movies
Hmm. Nice! All options I have not seen but heard great things about I did see Star Wars (1977) and really enjoyed that! :)
resp: For a good good comedy, I recommend Game Night (2018) Well, hopefully you can enjoy one of those.
